sentences.en: Abstain from sex or use condoms.
sentences.cn: 禁绝性事或使用安全套。

sentences.en: Apply mechanically an ad saying: Abstain fat goose liver, absolutely new style.
sentences.cn: 套用一句广告语: 自制肥鹅肝, 绝对新时尚.

sentences.en: Do you drink alcohol, smoke, or abstain?
sentences.cn: 你喝酒抽烟吗，还是烟酒不沾？

sentences.en: He promised to abstain from smoking, chewing, and profanity as long as he remained a member.
sentences.cn: 他答应戒掉吸烟, 嚼烟, 渎烟,一日当着会员,一日不破戒.

sentences.en: His doctor ordered him to abstain from beer and wine.
How will you rejoice and applaud yourself if you abstain?
sentences.cn: 如果你避开了,你将如何欢欣鼓舞和庆幸自己?

sentences.en: I had the common - sense to abstain from any word of excuse. I stood to be scorned.
sentences.cn: 我倒还有常识,一句辩白的话也不说,站在那里听她辱骂.

sentences.en: Patrons are requested abstain from smoking in the restaurant.
sentences.cn: 顾客请勿在餐馆内抽烟.

sentences.en: Six countries voted for the change, five voted against, and two abstained.
sentences.cn: 六个国家投票赞成变革，五个国家反对，两个国家弃权。

sentences.en: The doctor asked the patient to abstain from smoking.
The doctor has advised him to abstain from smoking.
The first step to virtue be to abstain from vice.
They did abstain from such things as planting trees in their gardens.
sentences.cn: 他们绝不参加在花园里栽树这样的事务.

sentences.en: Three countries abstained in the vote.
sentences.cn: 三个国家在投票中弃权了。

sentences.en: To abstain from ( or give up ) smoking and drinking are not easy.
sentences.cn: 戒烟戒酒并不是一件容易的事情.

sentences.en: To abstain from meat was a serious deviation.
sentences.cn: 茹素是比较严重的反常行为。

sentences.en: Xianchou to whether or not the show I would also abstain.
sentences.cn: 还是不拿出来献丑了.我也弃权.

trans.tran_en: If you abstain during a vote, you do not use your vote

trans.tran_cn: 戒（尤指酒），戒除，弃权，避免
trans.tran_en: to choose not to vote for or against something
